ValidationRule.description: An opportunity cannot be closed won if the synced quote is not accepted.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract received") ), TEXT(SyncedQuote.Status) <> "Accepted", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2023,1,1)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You Cannot Close An Opportunity If The Synced Quote Is Not Accepted.Please Accept The Quote!
